channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hackers stole over $2.7B in crypto in 2025, data shows
item.description: This was another banner year for crypto hacks and heists — 2025 was the third year in a row that a new crypto theft record was set.

item.title: Zoox issues software recall over lane crossings
item.description: The company has issued a software update to its autonomous driving system to fix its lane-crossing behavior.

item.title: NYPD Sued Over Possible Records Collected Through Muslim Spying Program

item.title: Laptop Buying Guide (2025): How to Choose the Right PC (Step-by-Step Guide)
item.description: Shopping for a laptop can be infuriating. Here’s how to sift through the acronyms, storage options, and extra features to find the best one for you.

item.title: US insurance giant Aflac says hackers stole personal and health data of 22.6 million people

item.title: ServiceNow to acquire cybersecurity startup Armis for $7.75B
item.description: The deal is expected to yield significant returns for Armis investors, including Sequoia, CapitalG, and Insight Partners.

item.title: The 50 Best Shows on HBO Max, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Heated Rivalry, Mad Men, and The Pitt are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: John Carreyrou and other authors bring new lawsuit against six major AI companies

item.title: The Best Unlimited Phone Plan: T-Mobile, AT&T, Verizon Compared
item.description: We sifted through the fine print to figure out how to score the best deal on all the major carriers.

item.title: Data Holds the Key in Slowing Age-Related Illnesses
item.description: More accurate and individualized health predictions will allow for preventative factors to be implemented well in advance.
